## protocolMiddleware() function

Wrap middleware to only execute on specific protocol(s)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function protocolMiddleware(protocol: string | string[], middleware: (ctx: KoattyContext, next: KoattyNext) => Promise<any>): (ctx: KoattyContext, next: KoattyNext) => Promise<any>;
```
